title: BRIEF-A.I.S. Resources Signs Option Agreement On New Lithium Solvent Extraction Technology
text:
BRIEF-A.I.S. Resources Signs Option Agreement On New Lithium Solvent Extraction Technology

Stock Markets 14 minutes ago (Oct 08, 2019 08:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-A.I.S. Resources Signs Option Agreement On New Lithium Solvent Extraction Technology Oct 8 (Reuters) - AIS Resources Ltd : * A.I.S. RESOURCES SIGNS OPTION AGREEMENT ON NEW LITHIUM SOLVENT EXTRACTION TECHNOLOGY * AIS RESOURCES - SIGNED 120 DAY OPTION AGREEMENT WITH EKOS RESEARCH TO INVEST $1 MILLION FOR 15% EQUITY IN ITS BREAK-THROUGH SOLVEX SOLVENT EXTRACTION PROCESS

BRIEF-A.I.S. Resources Signs Option Agreement On New Lithium Solvent Extraction Technology
